mapper.update: update from permission state = 0 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into permission
id,
mapping,
description,
function,
state,

mapping,

state,

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM permission where state = 1 limit #{fromIndex},#{pageSize}
